Denton.Downtown Denton Transit Center: Euline Brock Downtown Denton Transit Center (formerly Downtown Denton Transit Center) is a multimodal transit center that provides DCTA bus and A-train commuter rail connections in Denton, Texas. It is east of the Denton County Courthouse-on-the-Square and is the northern terminus of the A-train. In 2013, the station was renamed to honor Euline Brock, former mayor of Denton from 2000 to 2006.
